sources.title: Spaghetti A Mezzanotte 1988
sources.description: Savino (Lino Banfi) discovers his wife Celeste (Barbara Bouchet) is fooling around. Of course, Lino is having an affair with Elvira (Alida Chelli) so I am not sure how much room he has to complain.  Another slapstick Italian comedy with an unattractive male and lots of attractive women.  Italian with optional English subtitles
